name: Mouses way Home
description: Mouses way Home is a game developed for BLACK AND WHITE Jam with 'loop' as its theme. The game is straight forward. You have to take the mouse to its home as quick as possible. While doing so the player has to avoid direct contact with static (spikes) and dynamic (eagles, frogs) obstacles. The game also saves best record as any player who quickly finishes the level will able to save their record. This is best for those who are into speedrun.
